title: Saka´s return ´a real boost´ for Arsenal, says Rice
description: Declan Rice was quick to highlight Bukayo Saka’s importance after the winger scored a timely goal on his return from injury in Arsenal’s 2-1 win over Fulham at the Emirates Stadium on Tuesday. Saka, who had been sidelined for three months with a hamstring injury, made his first appearance since December last year, coming off […] The post Saka´s return ´a real boost´ for Arsenal, says Rice appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: McKenna insists Ipswich ´still in fight´ to avoid relegation
description: Kieran McKenna insists Ipswich Town are “still in the fight” to avoid Premier League relegation ahead of Wednesday’s trip to European hopefuls Bournemouth. Ipswich are 18th in the table before the visit to Vitality Stadium, where they visit 12 points adrift of safety after 17th-placed Wolves’ 1-0 win over West Ham on Tuesday.
